name: Frozen Negroni
description: In hot weather, you'll want to batch up this sophisticated frozen cocktail.
recipeIngredient: 4 1/2 ounces gin, such as G'Vine or Fords

recipeInstructions.text: Combine gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth in an airtight container. Place in freezer and freeze for at least 8 hours and up to 3 days.

When ready to serve, add chilled alcohol and ice to blender. Blend on high speed until uniform and smooth, about 30 seconds. Pour into rocks glasses or small wine glass. Garnish with an orange slice and serve immediately.
